title: Traction power fault on Circle Line

updates.text: [CCL] CLEARED: Train services between #PasirPanjang and #HarbourFront have resumed. Free regular bus and bridging bus services have ceased.
[CCL] CLEARED: Fault cleared. Train service is progressively returning back to normal. Free regular bus and bridging bus service are still available between #BuonaVista and  #HarbourFront.

[CCL]UPDATE: Additional 15 mins train travel time between #PasirPanjang and #HarbourFront due to a traction power fault. Free regular bus and bridging bus service are available between #BuonaVista and  #HarbourFront.
[CCL]: Due to a traction power fault, please allow additional 15mins travelling time between #PasirPanjang and #HarbourFront on both bounds.
